body_html: I just realised that the problem arises because my custom LSTM inherits from BasicLSTMCell, which requires that Inputs must be 2-dimensional. The above error thus arises because self.input_spec is set during initialisation and an error check on dimensionality is performed, so even though my custom call method handles the tuple of tensors, execution never reaches that code because it fails the dimensionality check. How do I get around this?
